name: Escape (Kelline)
overview: Measure your skill by guiding the hero in collecting the keys placed in the multiple positions in the huge underground cave system. The obstacles you will need to overcome to escape will be varied, numerous and somewhat random to give the game a continuous unpredictability. Jump safely, move the levers, find the keys and escape the cavern. Published in Italy under the names Cavern and Scapse in multiple publications including Hit Parade C64 n.24 (Giugno 1988).
